thread.title: Aussie A
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Aussie A

author: Aussie A
title: Aussie A
text:
I purchased a pair of Bvlgari sunglasses on Thursday 26 January (Australian Public Holiday). Sunglasses arrived the following Wednesday to a regional town in Australia.
Perfectly packaged, genuine brand - (I have the identical glasses that I previously purchased locally and checked to ensure authenticity).
I was worried after seeing other negative reviews, however I couldn't fault the product or the service. And they were $100 less than the pair I already have!
Very happy customer.
